Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
NameDesignGridLayout
DescriptionDesignGridLayout is a Swing LayoutManager that helps developers build always good looking dialogs through a very easy-to-use API, without any need for a graphical GUI designer.
Homepagehttp://designgridlayout.dev.java.net/nonav/site/
